name: @rainy-updates/cli
description: The fastest DevOps-first dependency CLI. Checks, audits, upgrades, bisects, and automates npm/pnpm dependencies in CI.

scripts.bench:check: bun run build && bun run bench:fixtures && node scripts/benchmark.mjs single-100 check cold 3 && node scripts/benchmark.mjs single-100 check warm 3
scripts.bench:review: bun run build && bun run bench:fixtures && node scripts/benchmark.mjs single-100 review cold 3 && node scripts/benchmark.mjs single-100 review warm 3
scripts.bench:resolve: bun run build && bun run bench:fixtures && node scripts/benchmark.mjs single-100 resolve cold 3 && node scripts/benchmark.mjs single-100 resolve warm 3
scripts.bench:ci: bun run build && bun run bench:fixtures && node scripts/benchmark.mjs mono-1000 ci cold 3 && node scripts/benchmark.mjs mono-1000 ci warm 3
scripts.perf:smoke: node scripts/perf-smoke.mjs && RAINY_UPDATES_PERF_SCENARIO=resolve node scripts/perf-smoke.mjs && RAINY_UPDATES_PERF_SCENARIO=ci node scripts/perf-smoke.mjs
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run check && bun run build && bun run test:prod
